description:
This data from Planet labs Inc. SkySat satellites was collected for
the experimental \"Skybox for Good Beta\" program in 2015, as well as for
various crisis response events and a few other projects. The data is
available in both a 5-band Multispectral/Pan collection, and a Pansharpened
RGB collection.

Each image's asset ID contains the acquisition date and time, for
example, image s01_20150304T080608Z was acquired on March 4, 2015 at
08:06 Zulu (UTC). For more information, please see the
[Planet Imagery Product Specifications](https://www.planet.com/products/satellite-imagery/files/Planet_Combined_Imagery_Product_Specs_December2017.pdf)
and visit the
[Planet Imagery and Archive](https://www.planet.com/products/planet-imagery/) site.

This Multispectral/Pan collection contains images with five 16-bit bands
shifted up from the original 12-bit data. The B, G, R, and Near-IR bands
have a resolution of approximately 2m per pixel, while the Pan band is
approximately 0.8m resolution (closer to 1m for off-nadir images).

links.title: Run the example for SKYSAT/GEN-A/PUBLIC/ORTHO/MULTISPECTRAL in the Earth Engine Code Editor

gee:terms_of_use:
This dataset is made available publicly under the Creative Commons by
Attribution license(CC-BY-4.0).
title: Planet SkySat Public Ortho Imagery, Multispectral

gee:schema.description: Unique catalog ID corresponding to a single collection event; same across all three detectors.
gee:schema.name: catalogID

gee:schema.description: ISO 8601 collection end time (UTC).
gee:schema.name: collectionEndTime

gee:schema.description: ISO 8601 collection start time (UTC).
gee:schema.name: collectionStartTime

gee:schema.description: 'Strip', 'Point', 'Area', or 'Path'.
gee:schema.name: collectionType

gee:schema.description: Product type identifying the product level ('Orthorectified Imagery').
gee:schema.name: productType

gee:schema.description: ID of this version of this product, generated by Singer/TileMill.
gee:schema.name: productionID

gee:schema.description: N/A
gee:schema.name: productionSystemVersion

gee:schema.description: The method used for interpolated pixel values.
gee:schema.name: resamplingMethod

gee:schema.description: Maximum satellite azimuth angle over the collection (degrees).
gee:schema.name: satelliteAzimuthAngleMax

gee:schema.description: Mean satellite azimuth angle over the collection (degrees).
gee:schema.name: satelliteAzimuthAngleMean

gee:schema.description: Minimum satellite azimuth angle over the collection (degrees).
gee:schema.name: satelliteAzimuthAngleMin

gee:schema.description: Maximum satellite elevation angle over the collection (degrees).
gee:schema.name: satelliteElevationAngleMax

gee:schema.description: Mean satellite elevation angle over the collection (degrees).
gee:schema.name: satelliteElevationAngleMean

gee:schema.description: Minimum satellite elevation angle over the collection (degrees).
gee:schema.name: satelliteElevationAngleMin

gee:schema.description: Unique name identifying the spacecraft.
gee:schema.name: satelliteName

gee:schema.description: N/A
gee:schema.name: snaptoAlignmentConfidence

gee:schema.description: N/A
gee:schema.name: snaptoReferenceAssets

gee:schema.description: Solar azimuth angle at the time of collection.
gee:schema.name: solarAzimuthAngle

gee:schema.description: Solar elevation angle at the time of collection.
gee:schema.name: solarElevationAngle

gee:schema.description: N/A
gee:schema.name: terrainBlendEpoch

instruments: CMOS Frame Camera with Panchromatic and Multispectral halves
